text: anal, ninkal utanpatikkai ceytu konta inta musrikkukalil, etaiyum kuraittu vitamalum, unkalukku virotamaka evarukkum utavi ceyyamalum irukkinrarkalo avarkalait tavira avarkalukku avarkalin utanpatikkaiyai avarkalin kalak ketuvaraiyil puranamaka niraiverrunkal - niccayamaka allah payapaktiyutaiyorai necikkinran
